mapper.select: SELECT a.*, pc.*, sw.*, etc.* FROM ITASSETS a LEFT JOIN PCSPEC pc ON (a.assets_name LIKE '%노트북%' OR a.assets_name LIKE '%데스크탑%') AND a.spec_num = pc.spec_num LEFT JOIN SWSPEC sw ON (a.assets_name LIKE '%서버%') AND a.spec_num = sw.spec_num LEFT JOIN ETCSPEC etc ON a.spec_num = etc.spec_num AND a.assets_name NOT LIKE '%노트북%' AND a.assets_name NOT LIKE '%데스크탑%' AND a.assets_name NOT LIKE '%서버%'
